content: this granny square waffle stitch pillow is a great beginner project and works up fast learn the waffle stitch and add style and comfort to your home **the pattern is free with ads on my website ** > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this pattern can also be found in my > crochet membership which includes over > 400 patterns and 100s of video > tutorials you can join the membership > here 1 ***you can also get this pattern in the crochet waffle stitch made easy ebook with 12 crochet patterns right here 2 *** 1 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/the-crochet-club/ ref=ravelry 2 https //nickinhc--nickishomemadecrafts thrivecart com/crochet-waffle-stitch-made-easy/ ref=ravelry
